mapper.update: update keyword_info set keyword_search_count = keyword_search_count + 1 where keyword = #{keyWord}
mapper.select: select arInfo.doc_id from article_info arInfo, (select author_id from author_info where author_name in ( ${authorList} )) auid, article_to_author atau where atau.author_id = auid.author_id and atau.doc_id = arInfo.doc_id;

select distinct arInfo.doc_id from article_info arInfo, (select author_id from author_info where author_name REGEXP #{author}) auid, article_to_author atau where atau.author_id = auid.author_id and atau.doc_id = arInfo.doc_id;

select arInfo.doc_id from article_info arInfo, (select affiliation_id from affiliation_info where affiliation_name in ( ${affiliationList} )) afid, article_to_affiliation ataf where ataf.affiliation_id = afid.affiliation_id and ataf.doc_id = arInfo.doc_id;

select distinct arInfo.doc_id from article_info arInfo, (select affiliation_id from affiliation_info where affiliation_name REGEXP #{affiliation}) afid, article_to_affiliation ataf where ataf.affiliation_id = afid.affiliation_id and ataf.doc_id = arInfo.doc_id;

select arInfo.doc_id from article_info arInfo, (select keyword_id from keyword_info where keyword in ( ${keyWordList} )) kid, article_to_keyword atk where atk.keyword_id = kid.keyword_id and atk.doc_id = arInfo.doc_id;

select distinct arInfo.doc_id from article_info arInfo, (select keyword_id from keyword_info where keyword REGEXP #{keyWord}) kid, article_to_keyword atk where atk.keyword_id = kid.keyword_id and atk.doc_id = arInfo.doc_id;

select arInfo.doc_id from article_info arInfo, (select publication_id from publication_info where publication_title REGEXP #{publication} or publication_type = #{publication}) pid where pid.publication_id = arInfo.publication_id;

select arInfo.doc_id from article_info arInfo, (select publication_id from publication_info where publication_year between #{startTime} and #{endTime}) pid where pid.publication_id = arInfo.publication_id;
